2,3c2,4
< @keyframes ripple_effect { from { background-image: -gtk-gradient(radial, center center, 0, center center, 0.001, to(alpha(currentColor, 0.12)), to(transparent)), linear-gradient(to bottom, alpha(currentColor, 0)); }
<   to { background-image: -gtk-gradient(radial, center center, 0, center center, 0.4, to(alpha(currentColor, 0.12)), to(transparent)), linear-gradient(to bottom, alpha(currentColor, 0.12)); } }
